b1ccd66d-539c-40dd-96ad-35688094ba0b.description: Earners of this credential can apply essential concepts related to common laboratory mouse strains in genetic and genomic research. Earners are able to define inbred, outbred, and hybrid mouse strains and their breeding schemes, understand how substrains develop, apply strategies to minimize genetic drift and understand the importance of animal health monitoring.
b1ccd66d-539c-40dd-96ad-35688094ba0b.name: Common Laboratory Mouse Strains

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Common Laboratory Mouse Strains MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

99344b6e-6cdf-47b2-a3cc-0c19a5077367.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed three JAX Online MiniCourses. Earners have demonstrated their knowledge by scoring passing grades on associated course quizzes.
99344b6e-6cdf-47b2-a3cc-0c19a5077367.name: JAX Online MiniCourses: Level 1 (Bronze)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the learning activities in three JAX Online MiniCourses.
Score passing grades on associated course quizzes.
Course duration: six hours

bd79fb2c-522e-48c6-8871-2bfe03d7d512.description: Earners of this credential have gained an understanding of laboratory mouse reproductive biology by examining basic anatomy, sex determination, the fertilization process and the estrous cycle. Earners are able to relate reproductive biology research outcomes to clinical applications of human health.
bd79fb2c-522e-48c6-8871-2bfe03d7d512.name: Reproductive Biology of the Laboratory Mouse

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Reproductive Biology of the Laboratory Mouse MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

e39e19c0-3b25-454b-885d-d613c8cebd3c.description: Earners of this credential can create and use mutant and transgenic mouse strains in genetic and genomic research. Earners are able to distinguish different genetic engineering technologies, comprehend how to move mutations, correctly use nomenclature and select appropriate genetic controls.
e39e19c0-3b25-454b-885d-d613c8cebd3c.name: Mutant and Transgenic Mouse Strains

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Mutant and Transgenic Mouse Strains MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

625ceff5-1a0c-4688-ab57-8ee36290e04c.description: Earners of this credential can recognize the key features of cancer cells and describe the genetic and environmental factors that contribute to cancer risk and development. Earners are able to define different types of cancers with respect to inheritance of gene variants, analyze case studies related to hereditary cancer syndromes, and identify measures to prevent cancer or detect cancer at early stages.
625ceff5-1a0c-4688-ab57-8ee36290e04c.name: Exploring Cancer: Biology and Inheritance

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Exploring Cancer: Biology and Inheritance MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.

08e30ba1-9f79-4505-9c60-0b5dd84d20ca.description: Earners of this credential have gained an understanding of utilizing the CRISPR/Cas9 gene editing technology in order to manipulate a gene of interest. Earners are able to define the mechanism that underlies the CRISPR/Cas9 genome engineering technology, formulate a complete strategy for performing fundamental genetic engineering experiments, evaluate CRISPR/Cas9 strategies for generating better mouse models and solve CRISPR/Cas9 complications.
08e30ba1-9f79-4505-9c60-0b5dd84d20ca.name: Basics of CRISPR/Cas9

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Basics of CRISPR/Cas9 MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

ed2bbce5-887c-4134-958f-fe2854c5aa60.description: Earners of this credential have examined the historical context that led to the mouse becoming the preeminent animal model system. Earners are able to define the unique advantages of using mice in genetic and genomic research and outline the latest advances in genetic engineering.
ed2bbce5-887c-4134-958f-fe2854c5aa60.name: History and Development of the Mouse Model System

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the History and Development of the Mouse Model System MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

0c38bccd-48e1-4765-9c22-d92e40cce57c.description: Earners of this credential can apply the most efficient breeding strategies for experimental and control mice. Earners are able to design breeding strategies for mouse models working with one or two alleles, or create new complex mouse models with three of more unique genes and apply a 4-step process to develop efficient breeding schemes.
0c38bccd-48e1-4765-9c22-d92e40cce57c.name: Breeding Strategies: Simple to Complex

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Breeding Strategies: Simple to Complex MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

1845393d-6055-4031-89c2-d13462ef93d3.description: Earners of this credential have gained a basic understanding of genetics versus epigenetics, including the nature of genetic modification (mutation, permanent) versus epigenetic modification (reversible or transient chemical tags), and how each are affected by environment and transmitted across generations.
1845393d-6055-4031-89c2-d13462ef93d3.name: Beyond Genes: Epigenetics, Environment and Health

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Beyond Genes: Epigenetics, Environment and Health MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

3cfaa09f-fb3e-4b96-9522-2c5691dd83ac.description: Earners of this credential are able to determine applicability of various diversity models for a variety of common research applications. Earners can also identify key characteristics of diversity mouse models and how each can be applied in research to leverage genetic heterogeneity as a means to better understand biological systems and to improve the translatability of research.
3cfaa09f-fb3e-4b96-9522-2c5691dd83ac.name: Mouse Genetic Diversity: Translating Discoveries to Humans

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Diversity Mouse Models MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.

8aaa8df7-ec6c-4de9-9216-03834e8cdd8b.description: Earners of this credential understand how the Cre-lox system is utilized to make different types of mouse models for research. Earners are able to define the basic Cre-lox system, apply breeding schemes to generate tissue specific knock-outs, general knock-outs and inducible knock-outs and understand how to turn on fluorescent reporter genes.
8aaa8df7-ec6c-4de9-9216-03834e8cdd8b.name: Cre-lox Technology in Mouse Modeling

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Cre-lox Technology in Mouse Modeling MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

fd4afd5b-fd84-42e2-a745-66c0e5e746f6.description: Earners of this credential can correctly genotype a JAX mouse strain and successfully run a JAX protocol. Earners are able to evaluate the importance of genotyping when working with mice, define different types of genotyping strategies, correctly interpret JAX genotyping information, prepare DNA from a mouse for genotyping and apply best practices of PCR.
fd4afd5b-fd84-42e2-a745-66c0e5e746f6.name: Genotyping Mice

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Genotyping Mice MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

afe9dbd2-11b2-4d24-b8cd-1cc176a726e2.description: Earners of this credential have gained an understanding of the study of complex traits genetics in mice. Earners are able to define how inbred mouse strains and advanced mouse populations enable complex traits genetics techniques such as Quantitative Trait Locus (QTL) mapping.
afe9dbd2-11b2-4d24-b8cd-1cc176a726e2.name: Mapping Complex Traits in Mice

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Mapping Complex Traits in Mice MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

a4cc3b7e-22dc-47f2-b918-f458ea8e93b0.description: Earners of this credential discover how two genetically diverse mouse models are used for understanding complex traits; the Collaborative Cross (CC) and the Diversity Outbred (DO). Earners are able to evaluate a genetically diverse population study in which the Diversity Outbred mouse is utilized as a useful tool to study complex traits.
a4cc3b7e-22dc-47f2-b918-f458ea8e93b0.name: Diversity Outbred Mice

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Diversity Outbred Mice MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

9edf860f-71da-41a0-ba0e-dacc36a55f03.description: Earners of this credential can define the role of genetic engineering in biomedical research and outline the basic workflow of three genetic engineering techniques: embryonic stem cell-based engineering, CRISPR/Cas9 and transgenic mutagenesis. Earners are able to define the advantages and limitations of each genetic engineering technique, identify the types of genetic modifications that can be generated and determine different ways genetically modified mice are used in research.
9edf860f-71da-41a0-ba0e-dacc36a55f03.name: Introduction to Genetic Engineering

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Introduction to Genetic Engineering MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.

3dba3afb-0b04-497b-ae51-21c8c023777d.description: Earners of this credential can accurately size experimental mouse colonies to match genetic and genomic research needs in a consistent manner using a minimum of resources. Earners are able to use a worksheet and estimate the number of breeders needed for regular consistent production of mice, analyze which colony output decisions impact colony size and identify how maintaining mixed age colonies promotes more consistent breeding performance.
3dba3afb-0b04-497b-ae51-21c8c023777d.name: Sizing Mouse Colonies

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Sizing Mouse Colonies MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

b227c60a-ff00-468a-93c4-309dd4698c9d.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed six JAX Online MiniCourses. Earners have demonstrated their knowledge by scoring passing grades on associated course quizzes.
b227c60a-ff00-468a-93c4-309dd4698c9d.name: JAX Online MiniCourses: Level 2 (Silver)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the learning activities in six JAX Online MiniCourses.
Score passing grades on associated course quizzes.
Course duration: 12 hours

97331e3a-124a-4862-927c-b56a0e783f3a.description: La persona merecedora de esta insignia comprende los conceptos fundamentales relacionados con las cepas de ratones endogámicos y la creación de recursos genéticos. Puede definir las causas de la diversidad genética entre cepas de ratones, programas de reproducción de cepas de ratón de laboratorio y como crear de recursos genéticos clásicos.
97331e3a-124a-4862-927c-b56a0e783f3a.name: Cepas de Ratones Endogámicos y Recursos Genéticos

badge_template_activities.title: Completar las lecciones en el MiniCurso de Cepas de Ratones Endogámicos y Recursos Genéticos.
Obtén una calificación aprobatoria en el cuestionario final.
Duración del curso: una hora

42d3dd5a-5b7e-4def-acd5-ebb3cb041f88.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed 12 JAX Online MiniCourses. Earners have demonstrated their knowledge by scoring passing grades on associated course quizzes.
42d3dd5a-5b7e-4def-acd5-ebb3cb041f88.name: JAX Online MiniCourses: Level 4 (Platinum)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the learning activities in 12 JAX Online MiniCourses.
Score passing grades on associated course quizzes.
Course duration: 24 hours

86879b84-4140-4286-a2aa-4a29c6ee5786.description: Earners of this credential have successfully completed nine JAX Online MiniCourses. Earners have demonstrated their knowledge by scoring passing grades on associated course quizzes.
86879b84-4140-4286-a2aa-4a29c6ee5786.name: JAX Online MiniCourses: Level 3 (Gold)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the learning activities in nine JAX Online MiniCourses.
Score passing grades on associated course quizzes.
Course duration: 18 hours

0f69b9cc-e58d-4714-9130-bfa9592d9c91.description: Earners of this credential can recognize and define sequencing technologies and experimental models that have revolutionized the design of genomic-based therapies for cancer. Earners are able to differentiate next generation sequencing (NGS) approaches by research application, compare the advantages and limitations of cell-based cancer models, and distinguish between mouse models used in cancer research.
0f69b9cc-e58d-4714-9130-bfa9592d9c91.name: Exploring Cancer Research: Tools and Technologies

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Exploring Cancer Research: Tools and Technologies MiniCourse.
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

7a14b096-74f8-4c27-b7d8-961e9e210372.description: La persona merecedora de esta insignia puede aplicar conceptos esenciales relacionados con cepas de ratones mutantes y transgénicos en la investigación genética y genómica. Puede distinguir entre las tecnologías utilizadas para modificar el genoma del ratón, desarrollar una estrategia de retrocruzamiento para trasladar una mutación de un trasfondo genético a otro, usar correctamente la nomenclatura y elegir los controles genéticos adecuados según los trasfondos genéticos de las cepas mutantes.
7a14b096-74f8-4c27-b7d8-961e9e210372.name: Cepas de Ratón Mutantes y Transgénicos

badge_template_activities.title: Completar las lecciones en el MiniCurso de Cepas de Ratón Mutantes y Transgénicos.
Obtén una calificación aprobatoria en el cuestionario final.
Duración del curso: dos horas

c29895d4-6e7b-4c8c-bcda-9dd305b4da5f.description: La persona merecedora de esta insignia puede aplicar conceptos esenciales relacionados con cepas comunes de ratones de laboratorio en la investigación genética y genómica. Puede definir ratones endogámicos, híbridos y exogámicos, programas de reproducción de cepas, cómo se desarrollan las subcepas, aplicar estrategias para minimizar la deriva genética y comprender el monitoreo de la salud animal y condiciones de alojamiento.
c29895d4-6e7b-4c8c-bcda-9dd305b4da5f.name: Cepas Comunes de Ratones de Laboratorio

badge_template_activities.title: Completar las lecciones en el MiniCurso de Cepas Comunes de Ratones de Laboratorio.
Obtén una calificación aprobatoria en el cuestionario final.
Duración del curso: dos horas

2ffdb810-6488-48f8-aaaa-2224f60fd133.description: Earners of this credential can define the unique advantages of using mice in genetic and genomic research. Earners are able to analyze the process for the basic inbred strain experiment and utilize mating schemes to create new genetic resources including consomics, congenics, recombinant inbreds and coisogenics.
2ffdb810-6488-48f8-aaaa-2224f60fd133.name: Basics of Mouse Genetics (小鼠遗传学基础)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Basics of Mouse Genetics MiniCourse (小鼠遗传学基础).
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

40f77953-7cdf-4ed7-94c7-84ccee1cf5a3.description: Earners of this credential have examined the historical context that led to the mouse becoming the preeminent animal model system. Earners are able to define the unique advantages of using mice in genetic and genomic research and outline the latest advances in genetic engineering.
40f77953-7cdf-4ed7-94c7-84ccee1cf5a3.name: History and Development of the Mouse Model System (小鼠模型系统的历史和发展)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the History and Development of the Mouse Model System MiniCourse (小鼠模型系统的历史和发展).
Score a passing grade on the final quiz.
Course duration: two hours

7fbc0ded-56fe-40dc-abe0-3355b20fbffc.description: Earners of this credential have gained an understanding of laboratory mouse reproductive biology by examining basic anatomy, sex determination, the fertilization process and the estrous cycle. Earners are able to relate reproductive biology research outcomes to clinical applications of human health.
7fbc0ded-56fe-40dc-abe0-3355b20fbffc.name: Reproductive Biology of the Laboratory Mouse (实验室小鼠生殖生物学)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning activities in the Reproductive Biology of the Laboratory Mouse MiniCourse (实验室小鼠生殖生物学).
